name: Malinda Pushpakumara
bio: Pawuluge Malinda Pushpakumara, commonly as Malinda Pushpakumara (born 24 March 1987) is a professional Sri Lankan cricketer who plays Test and ODIs. He plays for Colombo Cricket Club in first-class cricket.[1] In January 2019, he took all ten wickets in an innings in a first-class cricket match.[2]
